source_name: 示例-中国大陆GFA规则片段
text: 当层高≥2.20m计入建筑面积；层高介于1.20m至2.20m按一半计入；层高小于1.20m不计入。阳台有围护结构计入建筑面积，挑阳台按一半计入；雨篷不计入。屋顶平台无围护不计入。电梯井和楼梯间计入。地下室用于停车的面积按一半计入；设备用房计入；垃圾房计入。

For storey height less than 1.5 m, not included; between 1.5 m and 2.2 m counted as 50%; 2.2 m or above included in GFA. Balconies may be excluded from GFA subject to conditions; roof terrace without enclosure excluded; lift shafts included; staircases included. Utility canopy excluded. Car parks generally excluded from GFA under PNAP; basements for plant rooms included; refuse room included.

Floor area includes spaces with ceiling height >= 7 ft; spaces with height between 5 ft and 7 ft count as 50%; below 5 ft excluded. Exterior balconies excluded; canopies excluded; roof deck without walls excluded; elevator shafts included; stairwell included. Parking garages may be excluded per zoning; basements used for storage excluded if height < 7 ft; plant rooms included.

source_name: 示例-欧洲成员国指引片段
text: 当净高≥2.5m计入；净高1.5m到2.5m按一半计入；小于1.5m不计入。带封闭围护的外廊计入，开放外廊不计；屋顶露台不计；楼梯井与电梯井计入。地下室用于停车不计，设备用房计入，垃圾房计入。
